statements: Oh good, you found the drone bay.  Sorry about the bad tip with the rescue ship.
OK, look - how was I supposed to know it was rigged?  It looked like a regular rescue ship to me too!
Anyway.  We need to launch a drone and take a look around.  There has to be someone who can help us.
However, the Groundhog's sensors are *way* offline - you saw the bridge - so we need some eyes out there.
This bay manufactures and replenishes drones as needed, so don't worry about screwing up.
However, it nominally has (had?) a crew of 4, so you might have to get creative to cause a launch.
